DOC.brief_summary: JJ ureteral stent represent advance management upper urinary tract obstruction allow patient resume activity although stented kidney bladder . However , many case , JJ stent well tolerate even unbearable . This trial evaluate benefit tamsulosin ( alpha-blocker ) improve tolerance JJ stent compare low-doses phloroglucinol .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Efficacy Tamsulosin ( Alpha Blockers ) Compared Phloroglucinol Improving JJ Ureteral Stent Tolerance . A Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients age 18 . 2 . Nononcological indication ureteral stenting 3 . Informed write consent 1 Any contraindication Tamsulosin phloroglucinol ( renal hepatic insufficiency , allergy ) 2 . Pregnancy 3 . Patients already treat alpha blocker
